message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to lower the price?
I understand that $200 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $175?
I appreciate the compromise, but $175 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to go a bit lower?
I understand that $175 was a bit too high, but I'm still willing to make a deal. How about we meet at $165?
I'm getting closer to the price I'm willing to pay, but $165 is still a bit high. Would you be willing to meet me at $145?
I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about we compromise at $157.50?
I'm getting close to my budget, but $157.50 is still a bit too high. Would you be willing to meet me at $150?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $155. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price. How about we meet at $155?
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm not willing to pay $155. I'll meet you at $152.50. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
